name: claroty
label: Claroty
description: Claroty CTD is a robust solution that delivers comprehensive cybersecurity controls for industrial environments. This connector provides automated actions like Get Assets, Get Alerts, Resolve Alert and Get Alert Details

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Server name or IP address of the claroty server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: server_url

fields.title: Username
fields.description: Username used to access the claroty server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: username

fields.title: Password
fields.description: Password used to access the claroty server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: password

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.By default, this option is set as True.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Get Assets
operations.description: Get assets from claroty server based on input parameters you have provided.

parameters.title: Filters
parameters.name: filters
parameters.tooltip: Enter json key value pairs to filter the response based on it. e.g {"ipv4__exact": "1.1.1.1", "insight_status__exact": 1}
parameters.description: Enter json key values to filter the assets response based on parameters provided.  e.g {"ipv4__exact": "1.1.1.1", "insight_status__exact": 1}. list of fields that can be used as fields- ipv4__exact, ipv6__exact, mac__icontains, vlan__exact, address__exact, gateway__exact, asset_type__exact, host_name__exact, os__exact, model__icontains, vendor__icontains, state__exact, domain_names__exact, firmware__exact, serial__exact, generic__icontains, display_name__icontains, criticality__exact, old_ip__exact, protocol__exact, last_seen__exact, q__icontains, alert_id__exact, baseline__exact, arp_baselines__exact, insight_status__exact, insights_insight_name__exact, insight_timestamp__gte, insight_timestamp__lte, baseline_category__exact, baseline_access_type__exact, insight_name__exact, insight_row_key__exact, ghost__exact, tasks__exact, active_queries__exact, subnet_tag__exact, custom_attributes__exact, class_type__exact, domain_name__exact, involved_in_tags__exact, hosted_tags__icontains, id__exact, site_id__exact, timestamp__exact, approved__exact, valid__exact, parsed__exact, special_hint__exact, risk_level__exact, network_id__exact, virtual_zone_id__exact, subnet_id__exact, purdue_level__exact

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: per_page
parameters.tooltip: Maximum number of assets to return in response
parameters.description: Maximum number of assets to return in response

parameters.title: Page
parameters.name: page
parameters.tooltip: Page number from which page you wants to fetch the response
parameters.description: Page number from which page you wants to fetch the response

parameters.title: Format
parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Specifies the type of response (list of fields) returned by the query. If not provided, all asset's properties will return and could affect performance.

operations.title: Get Asset Details
operations.description: Get Details of an asset based on resource ID of an asset you have provided.

parameters.title: Resource ID
parameters.tooltip: Enter resource id of an asset which you wants to retrieve (in the format of <asset-id>-<site-id>)
parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: Enter resource id of an asset which you wants to retrieve (in the format of <asset-id>-<site-id>)

operations.title: Get Alerts
operations.description: Get Alerts from claroty server based on input parameters you have provided.

parameters.title: Filters
parameters.name: filters
parameters.tooltip: Enter json key values to filter the alerts response based on parameters provided. e.g{"asset_id__exact": "122", "severity__exact": 4}
parameters.description: Enter json key values to filter the alerts response based on parameters provided. e.g{"asset_id__exact": "122", "severity__exact": 4}. list of fields that can be used as key in filters paramaters page, per_page, asset_id__exact, asset__exact, for_asset__exact, q__exact, primary_asset__exact, non_primary_assets__exact, virtual_zone__exact, alert_id__exact, ot_alerts__exact, family__exact, story_severity__exact, id__exact, site_id__exact, data__exact, description__exact, type__exact, category__exact, severity__exact, timestamp__exact, relevant__exact, resolved__exact, resolution__exact, protocol__exact, score__exact, is_qualified__exact, network_id__exact, resolved_id__exact, assigned_id__exact, story_id__exact, sort

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: per_page
parameters.tooltip: Maximum number of alerts to return in response
parameters.description: Maximum number of alerts to return in response

parameters.title: Page
parameters.name: page
parameters.tooltip: Page number from which page you wants to fetch the response
parameters.description: Page number from which page you wants to fetch the response

operations.title: Get Alert Details
operations.description: Get alert details based on alert resource id you have provided

parameters.title: Resource ID
parameters.tooltip: Enter resource id of an alert whose details you wants to retrieve.(in the format of <alert-id>-<site-id>)
parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: Enter resource id of an alert whose details you wants to retrieve.(in the format of <alert-id>-<site-id>)

operations.title: Get Tasks
operations.description: Get all tasks and their information

parameters.title: Name Contains (Case-Sensitive)
parameters.name: name__icontains
parameters.tooltip: Filter tasks whose name contains input string
parameters.description: Filter tasks whose name contains input string

parameters.title: Site ID
parameters.name: site_id__exact
parameters.tooltip: Filter tasks based on input site ID
parameters.description: Filter tasks based on input site ID

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: per_page
parameters.tooltip: Maximum number of tasks to return in response
parameters.description: Maximum number of tasks to return in response

parameters.title: Page
parameters.name: page
parameters.tooltip: Page number from which page you wants to fetch the response
parameters.description: Page number from which page you wants to fetch the response

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the response based on selected input parameter. Available values are "name","-name","status","-status","enabled","-enabled","interval","-interval","start_time","-start_time","end_time","-end_time","allowed_run_time_start","-allowed_run_time_start","allowed_run_time_end","-allowed_run_time_end","last_run_results"

operations.title: Get Queries
operations.description: Get all queries and their information based on input parameters you have provided.

parameters.title: Name Contains(case-sensitive)
parameters.name: name__icontains
parameters.tooltip: Filter response data whose name contains input string
parameters.description: Filter response data whose name contains input string

parameters.title: Site ID
parameters.name: site_id__exact
parameters.tooltip: Filter response data based on input site ID
parameters.description: Filter response data based on input site ID

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the response based on selected input parameter. Available values are "name","-name","status","-status","enabled","-enabled","interval","-interval","start_time","-start_time","end_time","-end_time","allowed_run_time_start","-allowed_run_time_start","allowed_run_time_end","-allowed_run_time_end","last_run_results"

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: per_page
parameters.tooltip: Maximum number of items to return in response
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return in response

parameters.title: Page
parameters.name: page
parameters.tooltip: Page number from which page you wants to fetch the response
parameters.description: Page number from which page you wants to fetch the response

operations.title: Get Insights
operations.description: Get summary of an insights based on input parameters you have provided.

parameters.title: Format
parameters.name: format
parameters.tooltip: Enter format of an insight to fetch its summary
parameters.description: Enter format of an insight to fetch its summary

parameters.title: Sort By
parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort the response based on selected input parameter.

parameters.title: Host Exact
parameters.name: ghost__exact
parameters.tooltip: Filter response data whose host exact matches input string
parameters.description: Filter response data whose host exact matches input string

parameters.title: Special Hint Exact
parameters.name: special_hint__exact
parameters.tooltip: Select the special hint to filter the response based on it. Available values are 0,1,2,3,4
parameters.description: Select the special hint to filter the response based on it. Available values are 0,1,2,3,4

parameters.title: Insight Status Exact
parameters.name: insight_status__exact
parameters.tooltip: Select the insight status to filter the response based on it. Available values are 0,1,2
parameters.description: Select the insight status to filter the response based on it. Available values are 0,1,2

parameters.title: Site ID
parameters.name: site_id__exact
parameters.tooltip: Filter response data based on input site ID
parameters.description: Filter response data based on input site ID

parameters.description: Maximum number of items to return in response

parameters.description: Page number from which page you wants to fetch the response

operations.title: Get Events
operations.description: Get events from claroty server based on input parameters you have provided.

parameters.title: Site ID
parameters.name: site_id
parameters.tooltip: Filter alerts based on input site ID
parameters.description: Filter alerts based on input site ID

parameters.title: ID
parameters.name: id__exact
parameters.tooltip: Filter events based on input ID
parameters.description: Filter events based on input ID

parameters.title: Alert ID
parameters.name: alert_id__exact
parameters.tooltip: Filter alerts based on input alert ID
parameters.description: Filter alerts based on input alert ID

parameters.title: Timestamp
parameters.name: timestamp__exact
parameters.tooltip: Filter alerts based on input datetime matches exactly
parameters.description: Filter alerts based on input datetime matches exactly

parameters.title: Description
parameters.name: description__contains
parameters.tooltip: Filter events data based on input description given
parameters.description: Filter events data based on input description given

parameters.title: Description (case-sensitive)
parameters.name: description__contains
parameters.tooltip: Filter events data based on input description given
parameters.description: Filter events data based on input description given

parameters.title: Type
parameters.name: type__exact
parameters.tooltip: Filter alerts based on input type selected. Available values are
parameters.description: Filter alerts based on input type selected. Available values are

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status__exact
parameters.tooltip: Filter alerts based on input status selected. Available values are OT Alert, OT Operation, Alert and Not Risky Change
parameters.description: Filter alerts based on input status selected. Available values are OT Alert, OT Operation, Alert and Not Risky Change
